reviewText: This is still one of my favorite Christmas movies.  I think I love it so much because the town of Rosebud and its inhabitants that are featured in the story remind me very much of the small town that I moved to.  It's just a lighthearted, hilarious film. Nevermind it was made in the late 80's, the jokes are still great for a laugh!
When our VHS wore out, I knew that I wanted another copy so we went to the DVD.  The quality of the film is good.
I ordered this for someone else and do not know how they liked the movie. hopefully they liked the movie

I only buy things I love and this is one of my top ten comedies. To be really picky, which I'm never, I would have made a couple of very minor changes to the cast and script but, overall, this is one I will watch many times; especially when I need a ' pick me up'. All Chevy's movies are incredible entertainment, which the world used to have in abundance, but sadly lacks as each year passes.
very funny movie we loved it
Still funny after all these years!
